about_the_game:
A Cardinal, an expert in the occult, was sent with his acolytes to a remote island.

The mission was to unravel the secrets of an ancient civilization...

Your task is to find them...

But what you will discover will test your faith... and your humanity.

Descripción

Lighthouse Of The Souls is a third-person action Roguelite with RPG mechanics and realistic graphics. Face the challenges of a dark world alone or with friends, where survival will depend on your skill and strategy.

Key Features

  • Purge Zones: Clean areas infested with corruption by completing different missions.

  • Exploration: Immerse yourself in a realistic, dark and immersive environment.

  • Face Enemies: Eliminate different enemies, who will test your skill in intense combat.

  • Upgrade Your Equipment: Use the souls you collect to buy and upgrade your equipment.

  • Improve your character: Gain experience and upgrade skills that fit your play style.

  • Travel through portals: Face powerful bosses that represent the ultimate corruption, accessing their domains through portals.

Prepare to fight so that the souls of humanity can find their rest.

Choose your Character

  • Swiss Guard

  • Samurai

  • Exorcist

  • Dakota Warrior

content_descriptors.notes: We have references to the different faiths, in the world, and they are in part, the engine of our characters. It is a game, where you must fight evil, purge the island (killing hordes of corrupted)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K o AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 o AMD Radeon R9 380
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Compatible con DirectX
  • VR Support: No aplicable

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-7700K o AMD Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1080 o AMD RX Vega 64
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
